description.value:
Filled with useful information for Xenos Recognition, weapon maintenance, basic survival and medical tips, combat formations, and prayer hyms and litanies.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 5 T
